creditline: The Mary Griggs Burke Endowment Fund established by the Mary Livingston Griggs and Mary Griggs Burke Foundation, gifts of various donors, by exchange, and gift of Edmond Freis in memory of his parents, Rose and Leon Freis
description: drawing in black ink with touches of red; grimacing bald man wearing a short kimono, bending slightly down with feet wide apart, with sword held down; study of second head on PR foot of figure; two bundles at bottom, LLQ; lantern, URQ; some linear sketches (drapery?) on verso; unsigned
medium: Sketch; ink and color on paper
title: Study of a warrior slaying his sword
